Long live the Kraken!

This is going to be my new flag. Great work Magicide.
It would be so amazing if the kraken was friendly like that XD
I would like to have the Kraken's head mounted above my mantle.

I would like to have the Kraken's head mounted above my mantle.

But, but... the mantle is part of its head!

I wish my krakii were so friendly. Mine all bring their invisible blow torches to the party and heat things up at random :<
